scripts.start: concurrently -n "FLASK,CELERY,FLOWER,VITE-REACT,NODE" -c "bgCyan.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgRed.bold,bgMagenta.bold,cyan,cyan" "npm run flask-server" "celery -A py_flask.utils.tasks worker -B -E -f celery.log -l DEBUG" "celery -A py_flask.utils.tasks --broker=redis://localhost:6379/0 flower --port=5555" "npm run vite-react-dev" "npm run node"
